availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Henry Chatfield I (Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio, clerk and merchant)

body.p: Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio paper merchant. Ohio native. Son of Esther Chatfield. Married to Mary A. Disney Chatfield in Hamilton County, Ohio on November 23, 1854. Father of Mary K. Chatfield and Alfred Chatfield. Clerk in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio in 1850. Merchant in Cincinnati in 1860. Partner in the firm of Nixon, Chatfield & Woods in Cincinnati from June 13, 1860 to June 7, 1865. Partner in the firm of Chatfield & Woods in Cincinnati beginning June 7, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 7, p. 233B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati Ward 16, p. 18.
Ohio, County Marriage Records, 1774-1993Hamilton County, Film #000344468, p. 344, record #688.
Find A Grave, "William Henry Chatfield I (Jul 16, 1828-May 13, 1889)," Memorial #25369051, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25369051 (accessed May 7, 2020).
Cincinnati Daily Press(Cincinnati, OH), June 13, 1860.
The Cincinnati Enquirer(Cincinnati, OH), June 7, 1865.
